paper_abstract: Matrix converters are becoming an actual alternative for many AC-AC power conversion applications. This paper shows that it is possible to use the six-phase matrix converter to increase the maximum voltage gain. A complete diagram of simulation is presented. At last, evaluation of the study over students is showed. (c) 2010 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Comput Appl Eng Educ 21: 503-515, 2013
paper_title: Analysis and simulation of a six-phase matrix converter
